description:
In a world where aliens have invaded Edo Period Japan, skyscrapers, trains and motor bikes have replaced the simple life of Earth inhabitants. One man however, still carries the soul of a samurai, Gintoki Sakata, otherwise known as Yorozuya Gin-san. As reckless as he is, Gintoki carries his own resolve and is ready to take on any challenge with his fellow companions.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
It`s an emergency! Time has stopped in Edo! In the very first episode of the new season, time has frozen for everything and everyone except Gin-san, Kagura, and Shinpachi! Apparently the cause is the Universal Clock, which Gin-san found lying in the street and brought home with him, only to destroy it thinking it was an alarm clock. The Odd Jobs run around in circles while trying to get the clock repaired. Just what does fate have in store for Edo?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichiji Teishi wa Umai Guai ni wa Tomaranai
Quand le temps s’arrête, cela ne se passe pas toujours comme on le voudrait
You Can Never Pause at the Perfect Time
一時停止はうまい具合には止まらない

REGULAR.description:
The cause of the time freeze... was just a dead battery?! The Odd Jobs realize that the Universal Clock running out of battery was the reason the world`s time came to a stop. They try to replace the battery, but it`s apparently a special make not available on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Certaines poussières résistent même aux plumeaux
Even a Matsui Stick Can`t Handle Some Kinds of Dirt
Matsuibou demo Torenai Gomi ga Aru
マツイボウでもとれないゴミがある

REGULAR.description:
Since Gin-san was the White Yaksha, a major player in the Joi war, Hijikata orders a stakeout on Odd Jobs in order to find out if he`s still connected to the Joi rebels. This stakeout mission lands at the feet of Inspector Yamazaki Sagaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Inspector`s Love Begins with an Inspection
Kansatsu no Koi wa Kansatsu kara Hajimaru
L`amour d`un inspecteur commence par l`observation
監察の恋は観察から始まる

REGULAR.description:
Gin-san takes history lessons, and teaches you how to hide your porn mags?
Tsukuyo tries to teach Seita history, the subject he`s not great at. However, her training (?) methods end up leaving him scarred, which makes desperate Seita ask Gin-san to take over as his tutor...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au lieu d`apprendre le nom des ères, souviens-toi des hommes ! & Cache tes livres pornos, mais pas ton ***** !
Forget Dates, Remember People / You Can Hide Your Porn Mags but You Can`t Hide Your ***
Nengou Anki yori Ningen Yakitsukero / Ero Hon Kakushite OOO Kakusazu
年号暗記より人間焼きつけろ / エロ本隠して○○○隠さず

REGULAR.description:
Peeping at Odd Jobs through a mirror? One morning, Gin-san notices that the Odd Jobs kitchen has been fitted with a brand-new mirror. Stuck on it is a note from Otose, but it was all a ruse for Sacchan to peep at Gin-san from inside the mirror! Just what **** side of Gin-san will she end up witnessing?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mirror Provides a Frozen Reflection of Both Your Beautiful and Ugly Sides / Nobody Likes the Photo on Their License
Kagami wa Bi mo Shuu mo Ari no Mama o Utsushidasu / Menkyoshou no Shashin o Ki ni Itteru Yatsu wa Kaimu
Un miroir libère et délivre toute la vérité, beauté et laideur & Personne n`apprécie sa photo de permis
鏡は美も醜もありのままを映し出す / 免許証の写真を気に入ってる奴は皆無

REGULAR.description:
Gin-san`s invited to a Joi Rebels reunion, where he finds Katsura and Sakomoto, fellow survivors of the Joi War era, reminiscing about the past. Sick of seeing them in OPs and EDs all the time, Gin-san tries to leave immediately, but he`s shocked by the revelation that the organizer of the reunion wasn`t Katsura or Sakomoto, but rather the phantom fifth man, Kurokono Tasuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arriving Late to a Reunion Makes It Hard to Enter
Difficile de prendre part à une réunion d`anciens élèves quand on est en retard
Dousoukai wa Okurete Kuru to Hairizurai
同窓会は遅れてくると入りづらい

REGULAR.description:
With the letter from Takasugi proving to be a catalyst, the Joi rebel gang starts to remember Kurokono, and takes a trip down memory line to the Joi War era. After a gruelling battle with the Bakufu army, Gin-san and his comrades were taking a momentary rest at an abandoned temple. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Reunion Also Brings to the Surface Things You Don`t Want to Remember
Dousoukai wa Omoidashitakunai Omoide mo Yomigaette Kuru
Pendant une réunion d’anciens élèves, on se souvient aussi de choses qu’on préférerait oublier
同窓会は思い出したくない思い出も蘇ってくる

REGULAR.description:
Hijikata is offered a lottery ticket by the old lady who runs the cigarette store he frequents. Though initially he has no interest, he`s forced to take a ticket someone dropped, with assurances that "it`ll change the way the world looks."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comparé à celle des dieux, la vie humaine ressemble à une loterie illusoire
Ningen Gojuu Nen Geten no Uchi o Kurabureba Yume Takarakuji no Gotoku Nari
When Compared to Time in the Heavens, Fifty Years of Human Life Resembles Naught but Dreams and Lottery Tickets
人間五十年下天のうちをくらぶれば夢宝くじの如くなり

REGULAR.description:
Gin-san figures that the reason Odd Jobs isn`t get any requests at all lately is because of a lack of publicity. In order to make an advertising poster, he tries to come up with a catchy copy along with Kagura and Shinpachi, but the ideas they come up with all seem somewhat familiar. Just what kind of poster will they create?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guys with Big Nostrils Also Have Big Imaginations / You Never Accept a New Sentai Series at the Start, but by the Final Episode, You Don`t Want It to End
Hana no Ana no Dekai Yatsu wa Hassouryoku mo Dekai / Atarashiku Hajimaru Sentai Mono wa Saisho wa Konna no Mitomenee Mitai ni Natteiru ga Saishuukai no Koro ni wa Hanaretakunaku Natteiru
Les gens aux grosses narines ont aussi une grande imagination & Quand on regarde une nouvelle série sentai, on ne veut pas reconnaître ses qualités, mais arrivé à la fin, on ne peut plus s`en séparer
鼻の穴のデカイ奴は発想力もデカイ / 新しく始まる戦隊モノは最初はこんなの認めねェみたいになっているが最終回の頃には離れたくなくなっている

REGULAR.description:
One day, a fortune teller calls out to Kyubei as she`s walking down a street. After hearing her issues out, the fortune teller suggests to Kyubei that she should become a man in both mind and body once. The ridiculous suggestion angers Kyubei, but the very next moment, Kabuki District gets enveloped in a mysterious light. With everyone around her confused, Kyubei feels something off with her body and is shocked by the person reflected in the glass in front of her. Just what happened to her body?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 9 + 1 = Jyûbei
9 + 1 = Yagyu Jyubei
9 + 1 = Yagyuu Juubei
9+1=柳生十兵衛

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious light that covered all of the Kabuki District swapped the genders of everyone who was exposed! The culprits were Dekobokkoists, a religious cult on all the interspace wanted lists, who end up taking over the Kabuki District through its surveillance network.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Calorie wa Wasureta Koro ni Yattekuru
Calories Come Back to Bite You Just When You`ve Forgotten About Them
Les calories reviennent quand on les a oubliées
カロリーは忘れた頃にやってくる

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to the efforts of the Gintama hunks (?), the gender-swapping situation running roughshod over the Kabuki District is resolved. Or so it appears, but Ginko and everyone else in the Dekobokkoism base don`t get their original bodies back.
Source: crunchyroll

Seita has started going to temple school, but it looks like he`s finding it hard to fit in with the others. Apparently the reason lies in Hinowa`s extravagant stacked lunch boxes, but Hinowa herself doesn`t understand that at all. As such, she makes Tsukuyo make lunch for him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All Mothers Pack Too Much Food into a Lunch Box and Ruin the Shape
Le panier-repas de ma mère est toujours trop froid et un peu écrasé
Okaa-chan no Bentou wa Itsumo Tsumesugite Jakkan Tsubureteiru
母ちゃんの弁当はいつもつめすぎて若干つぶれている

REGULAR.description:
The Kabuki District is thrown into turmoil by a series of serial killings targeting drunkards. They were all cut through the neck, leaving just one tiny bit of flesh attached. And because of that, now there are rumors that it \Nwas the work of a Reaper. When Gin-san takes the deserted streets home drunk, he runs into a Reaper who asks for his help in committing suicide. This Reaper turns out to have a backstory that cannot be made public, and Gin-san and gang end up getting mixed up in this incident.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asa to Yoru no Shinigami
Les faucheuses du matin et de la nuit
The Reaper by Day and the Reaper by Night
朝と夜の死神

REGULAR.description:
The Reaper was Ikeda Asaemon, from a family of executioners. She had committed the sin of betraying and killing the former head of the family. And Gin-san was a criminal who was supposed to have been beheaded by the Ikeda family in the past. The family head, Ikeda Yaemon, requests Odd Jobs to keep Asaemon safe. The ship prepared for them seems to sailing smoothly but gets stopped in its tracks by Okita and Hijikata`s appearance. That`s when Okita reveals to them all the facts of this case...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Humain ou démon ?
Human or Demon?
Oni ka Hito ka
鬼か人か

REGULAR.description:
Asaemon points her blade at Yaemon of her own free will, but has a hard time due to Yaemon`s overwhelming strength. Gintoki joins the fight but gets wounded by Hitotsubashi retainers backing Yaemon up. With Gintoki and Asaemon on the backfoot, Yaemon tells Asaemon about how Gintoki killed her biological father. This makes her waver, with sword in hand. Just who will Asaemon kill, Gintoki or Yaemon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu, Faucheuse
Farewell, Reaper
Saraba Shinigami
さらば死神

REGULAR.description:
Has Madao finally found a job?! For some reason, he`s become the friendly scary-story teller at the park and comes to Odd Jobs to collect some more scary stories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Phoenix Rises from the Ashes Over and Over
Le phénix renaît toujours de ses cendres
Phoenix wa Nando mo Yomigaeru
フェニックスは何度も蘇る

REGULAR.description:
Gin-san opens up a confessional booth for Tama, but things go awry very quickly as the confessions lead him to a very painful truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amen
Amen
Amen
アーメン

REGULAR.description:
Gin-san gets arrested for killing a shogun! The Shogun, meanwhile, loses his memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Being a Leader Is Tough
Dur d`être chef
Leader wa Tsurai yo
リーダーは辛いよ

REGULAR.description:
The dirty hero who protects the Earth from the shadows of the kitchen shows up? On the night of the summer festival, when everyone`s in high spirits, Hijikata and Okita are making their rounds when they run into a man brandishing his sword at couples, who ends up being Kondo. He seems to have gone mad after his beloved Otae turned down his invitation to spend the festival together. Unable to bear the sorry sight, Hijikata and Okita give him a Roachief RX mask and run away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi wa Gokiburi Poipoi
L`amour est un piège à cafards
Love Is a Roach Motel
恋はゴキブリポイポイ

REGULAR.description:
The two big events of summer, watermelon splitting and endless homework, come together in this episode!
Kagura and Princess Soyo wonder if there`s a way to make watermelons even tastier, and Gin-san tells them how. However, this somehow leads to the princess getting kidnapped!
With summer break drawing to a close, Seita visits Odd Jobs with the most troublesome of requests: he wants help finishing his summer homework. Speaking of which, have you finished yours?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Sizzle Summer / A Nothing Summer, 2015
Begirama na Natsu / Nanimo Nee yo Natsu 2015
Un été Sizzle ! / Été 2015 : Il n`y a rien
ベギラマな夏 / 何もねぇよ夏2015

REGULAR.description:
When they meet with a traffic accident, Gintoki and Hijikata miraculously escape without a scratch, but their souls end up switching bodies. With no means to return to normal, Gintoki has to live as a freedom-loving Hijikata, and Hijikata as a Gintoki who stresses strict discipline. The change in these two leaders transforms the Shinsengumi and Odd Jobs into completely different organizations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m the Mayo Guy, and He`s the Sweet Tooth
Je suis mayonnaise, il est sucrerie
Ore ga Mayoraa de, Aitsu ga Amatou de
おれがマヨラーで あいつが甘党で

REGULAR.description:
Upon finding out that their egos were switched by Gengai`s Fully Automatic Egg-on-Rice Maker, Gintoki and Hijikata head out to find the cat`s corpse that sucked in half of Gintoki`s soul, only to find it transformed into something completely unexpected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m a Failure as a Leader, and He`s Also a Failure as a Leader
Je suis indigne d`être chef et il l`est tout autant
Ore ga Leader Shikkaku de, Aitsu mo Leader Shikkaku de
おれがリーダー失格で あいつもリーダー失格で

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Hijikata try everything they can to split Otae and Dozaemon-san up, but there are some other switcheroos happening behind the scenes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Odd Jobs, and He`s Shinsengumi
J`appartiens à l`Agence, lui au Shinsengumi
Ore ga Yorozuya de, Aitsu ga Shinsengumi de
おれが万事屋で あいつが真選組で

REGULAR.description:
Mutsu gets sick of Sakamoto after his idea of selling bags with room for 50 million falls flat, and dumps him in the ocean.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Always Leave Enough Room for Fifty Million in Your Bag
Bag wa Tsune ni Gosenman Hairu You ni Aketeoke
Ouvre toujours ton sac pour y mettre cinq millions
バックは常に5千万入るようにあけておけ

REGULAR.description:
With Sakamoto held captive by the former commander of the Chidori space pirates, Mutsu is forced to relive her past. Meanwhile, Gintoki comes to a startling realization about the woman known as the Razor XO.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Always Leave Enough Room for Pebbles in Your Bag
Bag wa Tsune ni Ishikoro ga Hairu You ni Aketeoke
Ouvre toujours ton sac pour y mettre des cailloux
バックは常に石ころがはいるようにあけておけ

REGULAR.description:
Shinpachi and the rest of Odd Jobs decide to go for a new look, with predictably disastrous results. In the second half, Shinpachi is tasked with learning the ultimate move his father left behind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mode est quelque chose qui devient obsolète dès qu`on la désigne comme telle / Il y a deux sortes d`hommes en ce monde, ceux qui crient le nom de leur attaque ultime et ceux qui s`en passent
Oshare to wa Oshare to Kotoba ni Shita Jiten de Kakikieru Mono Nari / Yo no Naka ni wa Ni Shurui no Ningen ga Iru Sore wa Hissatsuwaza o Sakebu Ningen to Sakebanai Ningen Da
Style Goes Out of Fashion the Moment It`s Put Into Words / There Are Two Types of People in This World: Those Who Yell Out Their Attack Names, and Those Who Don`t
オシャレとはオシャレと言葉にした時点でかき消えるものなり / 世の中には二種類の人間がいる それは必殺技を叫ぶ人間と叫ばない人間だ

REGULAR.description:
Kondo comes face to face with Ape Boy, a legendary thief, who takes him under his wing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futari no Etekou
Les deux singes
The Two Apes
二人の猿公

REGULAR.description:
Katsura infiltrates the Shinsengumi in a bid to take it down from the inside, but he finds he has an unexpected foe to deal with.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Afros of Life and Death
L`afro de la vie et la mort
Sei to Shi no Afro
生と死のアフロ

REGULAR.description:
Katsura spreads baseless rumors about Saito and puts him on trial. Gin-san and the others try to prevent his execution.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Afro et afloup
Afuro and Wolfro
Afurou to Afrou
阿腐郎とアフ狼

REGULAR.description:
The extreme heat of summer reminds everyone that Kagura is weak to sunlight. She is taken seriously ill, or so it seems...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shoki Settei wa Nametara Inochitori
Sous-estime les éléments de début d`intrigue et tu risques gros
Take the Initial Premise Lightly, and It`ll Cost You
初期設定はナメたら命取り

REGULAR.description:
What was supposed to be a mere feigned illness turned into a state funeral sending Kagura off! How can Kagura get out of this?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keep Your Farewells Short
Les adieux doivent être concis
Wakare no Aisatsu wa Kanketsu ni
別れの挨拶は簡潔に

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki helps Shachi, his partner in the mangaka duo Akurogi Musai, confess to a woman he`s infatuated with, and later with meeting a deadline.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Editor Is Enough / The G-Pen Is Capricious, and the Maru Pen Is Stubborn
Tantou Henshuu wa Hitori de Tariru / G-pen wa Kimagureya-san Maru-pen wa Gankomono
Un seul éditeur suffit / Le G-Pen est capricieux, le Maru est têtu
担当編集は一人で足りる / Gペンは気まぐれ屋さん丸ペンは頑固者

REGULAR.description:
Tetsuko, the swordsmith, asks Odd Jobs to look after her store, and Tama makes an oil-blooded friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Frappe tant que le fer et le Seigneur du Mal sont chauds / Pluie huileuse
Strike When the Sword and Overlord Are Hot / Oil Rain
Tetsu to Maou wa Atsui Uchi ni Ute / Oil no Ame
鉄と魔王は熱いうちに打て / オイルの雨

REGULAR.description:
The shogun`s assassination is set in motion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 1: Shogun de lumière et Shogun de ténèbres
Shogun Assassination Arc Part One: Shoguns of Light and Shadow
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Ichi: Hikari to Kage no Shogun
将軍暗殺篇一 光と影の将軍

REGULAR.description:
After Zenzo`s shocking betrayal, Takasugi looks to drive the shogun faction into a corner. Kamui also looks to do the same, but runs into Okita.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 2: Le village des ninjas
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Two: Ninja Village
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Ni: Shinobi no Sato
将軍暗殺篇二 忍の里

REGULAR.description:
The full truth about the Iga ninjas` involvement in the shogun assassination plot comes to light, as well as a surprising aspect of the shogun and Oniwaban`s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 3:L`âme d`un ninja
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Three: Ninja Soul
Shougun Ansatsu Hen San: Shinobi no Tamashii
将軍暗殺篇三 忍の魂

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki, Kagura, Shinpachi, Kondo, and Hijikata are the only five remaining who can protect the shogun from the Yato onslaught.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 4: Les cinq derniers
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Four: And Then There Were Five
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Yon: Saigo no 5-nin
将軍暗殺篇四 最後の5人

REGULAR.description:
Kagura vs. Kamui. Gintoki vs. Takasugi. The long-awaited battles finally begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 5: Ceux qui protègent tout
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Five: Those Who Protect Against All Odds
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Go: Banji o Mamoru Mono-tachi
将軍暗殺篇五 万事を護る者達

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Takasugi continue their fierce battle, and the truth about their past, and the animosity between them, is finally revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 6: Ennemis
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Six: Sworn Enemy
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Roku: Kataki
将軍暗殺篇六 仇

REGULAR.description:
The Tendoshu and Yatagarasu swoop in for the kill after the Shogun and Hitotsubashi factions wear each other out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 7: Après une bataille, les corbeaux croassent
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Seven: The Crows Caw After the Battle Ends
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Nana: Ikusa no Ato ni wa Karasu ga Naku
将軍暗殺篇七 戦のあとには烏が哭く

REGULAR.description:
Shigeshige makes his intentions clear in the face of Nobunobu`s appointment as shogun. Meanwhile, the full aftermath of the battle finally comes to light...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`assassinat du Shogun 8: Adieu, mes potes
Shogun Assassination Arc Part Eight: Farewell, Buddy
Shougun Ansatsu Hen Hachi: Saraba Dachikou
将軍暗殺篇八 さらばダチ公

REGULAR.description:
Big changes are afoot in Edo in the wake of Shigeshige`s funeral and Nobunobu`s appointment as shogun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 1: Le jour où le démon se lamente
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part One: The Day the Demon Cried
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Ichi: Oni ga Naita Hi
さらば真選組篇一 鬼が哭いた日

REGULAR.description:
As people struggle to come to terms with the new environment in Edo, Hijikata and Okita get some rather unexpected visitors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 2: Les héros arrivent toujours en retard
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Two: Heroes Always Arrive Fashionably Late
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Ni: Hero wa Okurete Yatte Kuru
さらば真選組篇二 ヒーローは遅れてやってくる

REGULAR.description:
Katsura reveals to Kondo that he got himself caught on purpose, and tells him about his ingenious scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 3: Objet oublié
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Three: Lost and Found
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen San: Mamore Mono
さらば真選組篇三 忘れもの

REGULAR.description:
As Kondo and gang run around Kokujo Island waiting for help to arrive, the Shinsengumi and Joi Rebel joint operation is joined by an unexpected third party!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 4: Évasion
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Four: Prison Break
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Yon: Datsugoku / Essay Manga wa Sakugaraku
さらば真選組篇四 脱獄 / エッセイ漫画は作画楽

REGULAR.description:
As the joint front makes landfall at Kokujo Island, Gintoki puts his plan into action.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 5: Chiens errants
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Five: Stray Dogs
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Go: Norainu
さらば真選組篇五 野良犬

REGULAR.description:
Sasaki Isaburo`s past with the Shinsengumi, Matsudaira, and Imai Nobume is finally revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 6: Le message non reçu
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Six: Undelivered Mail
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Roku: Todokanakatta Mail
さらば真選組篇六 届かなかったメール

REGULAR.description:
Things come to a head on Kokujo Island, as death itself descends upon the battlefield.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 7: Karma
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Seven: Karma
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Nana: Gou
さらば真選組篇七 業

REGULAR.description:
With everyone fighting to regroup and escape, Sasaki makes the same mistake one more time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 8: Nobume
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Eight: Nobume
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Hachi: Nobume
さらば真選組篇八 信女

REGULAR.description:
The complete fallout of the events at Kokujo Island come to light and brings about farewells nobody thought they`d ever see.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 9: Adieu, Shinsengumi
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Nine: Farewell Shinsengumi
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Kyuu: Saraba Shinsengumi
さらば真選組篇九 さらば真選組

SPECIAL.description:
The Gintama crew gets together to present a preview for the upcoming arc, the biggest ever in the anime`s history, and also discuss the difficulties involved in producing one mid-season.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jump Special Anime Festa 2015
Hare Matsuri (2016)
Sun Festival (2016)
銀魂晴祭り 2016
